title: What After It? (Consequences)
welcome: Let's explore what happens after certain actions!

fields.prompt: If you exercise daily, what might happen?
fields.hint: If I exercise daily, I will stay healthy and feel energetic.

fields.prompt: If you work hard, what will happen?
fields.hint: If I work hard, I will succeed.

fields.prompt: If it rains, what will you do?
fields.hint: If it rains, I will stay indoors.

validation_logic.feedback_fail: Let's try again and think about the results of actions.
